description:
A free, powerful, reliable and flexible plugin that allows you to create PDF files to be downloaded, opened or printed by your user's browser and/or save the PDF to your database. 

It works in the browser page and in backend workflows, uses no API, no external services and does not increases your app's costs. 
If used in the backend workflow it uses a little app capacity.

Read the forum thread for instructions!

Come visit your custom plugin shop www.unlimitedbubbling.dev and be limitless!
instructions: Use the plugin actions in a workflow to create the pdf and finish it with a download, print or open pdf action.
name: PDF Conjurer
